SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IRegistrationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegistrationController
public interface IRegistrationService
Interface for managing the registration logic between officers and BTO projects. Includes methods for creating, approving, rejecting, and retrieving registrations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addRegistration(String project, Registration registration)
    Adds a new registration entry under the specified project.
    String
    approveRegistration(Manager manager, Registration registration)
    Approves a registration by a manager.

    Creates a new Registration object with the specified details.

    Retrieves all officer registrations grouped by project name.

    Rejects a registration, preventing the officer from being assigned.

  • Method Details

    • getAllRegistrations

      Map<String,List<Registration>> getAllRegistrations()
      Retrieves all officer registrations grouped by project name.
      Returns:
      A map where the key is the project name and the value is a list of registrations.

    • getRegistrationsByProject

      List<Registration> getRegistrationsByProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves all officer registrations associated with a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the BTO project.
      Returns:
      A list of Registration objects for the given project.

    • addRegistration

      void addRegistration(String project, Registration registration)
      Adds a new registration entry under the specified project.
      Parameters:
      project - The name of the project.
      registration - The registration object to add.

    • createRegistration

      Registration createRegistration(int id, Officer officer, String projectName, LocalDate registrationDate, RegistrationStatus status)
      Creates a new Registration object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the registration.
      officer - The officer being registered.
      projectName - The name of the project.
      registrationDate - The date of registration.
      status - The current registration status.
      Returns:
      A new Registration object.

    • registerProject

      Registration registerProject(Officer officer, BTOProject project)
      Registers an officer to a specific BTO project.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer attempting to register.
      project - The BTO project to register for.
      Returns:
      A Registration object representing the registration.

    • approveRegistration

      String approveRegistration(Manager manager, Registration registration)
      Approves a registration by a manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager approving the registration.
      registration - The registration to approve.
      Returns:
      A message indicating success or failure of approval.

    • rejectRegistration

      String rejectRegistration(Manager manager, Registration registration)
      Rejects a registration, preventing the officer from being assigned.
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager rejecting the registration
      registration - Registration to reject
      Returns:
      Result message indicating success or reason for failure
